alert.note: Alert for Cumberland; Fluvanna; Goochland; Western Louisa (Virginia) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 16 at 5:22PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Louisa, northern Cumberland, northwestern Goochland and Fluvanna Counties through 600 PM EDT... At 521 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Charlottesville, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Lake Monticello around 540 PM EDT. Troy around 545 PM EDT. Palmyra around 555 PM EDT. Fork Union, Kents Store and Ferncliff around 600 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Dixie, Nahor, Stage Junction, Zion Crossroads, Central Plains, Union Mills, Caledonia, Wildwood, Bybee and Tabscott. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 900 PM EDT for central Virginia.
